verbs.description: [ARG1: it] [V: was] [ARG2: sears time to go like blockbuster sears had a good run it made money in its core business while it could and then someone else with a different set of competencies rose up to take its place when the market fundamentals shifted sears edward lampert chairman eddie lampert]
